lead_paragraph: FELDMAN--Marlene Jean. You are always in our hearts. From your beloved family, husband, sons and daughters, and grandchildren. Happy birthday! Love always. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  FELDMAN, MARLENE JEAN
